tool_description: Fast and Reliable Reverse Image Searches - Find the Sources of an Image and Referencing Web Pages in Real-Time.
name: Reverse Image Search
title: Reverse Image Search

api_list.name: Reverse Image Search
api_list.description: Send an image URL and get the top 400 source web pages.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to return (1-500). 
**Default**: `500`.

optional_parameters.name: safe_search
optional_parameters.description:
How to show explicit content in your search results, like sexual activity and graphic violence. 

**Allowed values:** `off, blur`
**Default:** `blur`
